metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7798 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Developer Tools feature suffers from a XUL injection vulnerability dueto improper sanitization of the web page source code. In the worst case,this could allow arbitrary code execution when opening a malicious pagewith the style editor tool. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.3and Firefox < 55.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7798` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
